bibl.title: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie B. Lawrence, February 22, 1876

div1.p: Reed writes Emilie Lawrence to expect his impending arrival

div1.head: Letter from Walter Reed to Emilie B. Lawrence, February 22, 1876

opener.dateline:
Willet's Point,
New York Harbor,
Feb. 22nd 76.

div1.p:
I neglec-
ted to write my second let-
ter, last week, in as much as
I expect to see you very
soon- and for the same
reason I shall make this
one “beautifully short”-
Expect me, Monday, the 28th
div1.closer:
And believe me, my darling,
as ever,
your fond &
devoted Walter,
